channel.title: Guides on Hello
channel.description: Recent content in Guides on Hello

item.title: Overview of Hugo Site Setup
item.description: This post is going to be about how I would go about setting up a website like mine now that I’ve done it. I’ve learned a lot, and ran into a lot of specific issues, and figured I could be helpful to others who run into these weird little issues too, as it was difficult to find information on them online. I’m not going to be going over the specifics of Hugo or really going into detail certain terms I am using.
